attributes.action: the only fireworks that should be available for sale are noiseless/silent.
attributes.additional_details: Fireworks that make noise are unnecessary. There are silent/noiseless fireworks available to purchase on the market so the suffering to the aforementioned groups can be eradicated with the simple removal of these items.
attributes.background: We would like the government to ban the sale/remove the license of fireworks that make noise to protect the health of pets, people with mental health conditions such as PTSD and people with autistic spectrum disorders

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758

While some fireworks are marketed as silent, these still make some noise. If you would like the Government to reduce the decibel limit to a specific level, you could start a new petition requesting this.
